content.text: 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained and flaked" )

content.text: 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "200 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "400 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the olive oil"@8:21 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium saucepan"@25:42 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium heat"@48:59 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in the mushrooms, green onions, garlic and cayenne pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the mushrooms"@11:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "green onions"@26:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic"@40:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cayenne pepper"@51:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "10 minutes"@8:18 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until tender"@23:35 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Transfer the mushroom mixture to a medium bowl.
5) Blend in the cream cheese and crabmeat.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Blend in"@3:11 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the cream cheese"@12:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "crabmeat"@33:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) On a lightly floured flat surface, roll each pastry sheet into a 12x12 inch square.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "roll"@38:42 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "each pastry sheet"@43:60 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "a 12x12 inch square"@66:85 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a lightly floured flat surface"@6:36 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Cut each sheet into nine 4x4 inch squares.
8) Place 1 tablespoon of the mushroom mixture onto each pastry square.
9) Fold the squares by bringing the corners to the center, creating an X. Place the squares on a medium baking sheet.
10) Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "20 minutes"@9:19 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-10-0 "the preheated oven"@23:41 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until golden brown"@46:64 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
